reviewText:
If you have children that need to learn, this movie is a big help. I started out with the Golden Step Ahead Vidoes, and (in 10th grade) I make straight A's.
You might just remember it from your own early childhood and are feeling a bit nostalgic. In either case, this movie is a gem!

Another of my favorites from my early childhood.  The circus comes to town and there is a clown with purple hair named Ready who teaches children an introduction to reading, as well as shapes and colors.
Favorite quotes:
WOMAN WITH THE BLOND HAIR:
Look out--they're going to crash!
JUGGLER JAKE:
Juggling the alphabet is as easy as ABC.
